data: Europe, Africa, Central Asia, Western Asia
_1 defines EMEA widely (inc Central Asia + Iran) and APAC narrowly
Oceania, Eastern Asia, South-eastern Asia, Southern Asia
Europe, Africa,  Central Asia, Western Asia excluding Iran
_2 is the same as _1 but with Iran in APAC not EMEA
Oceania, Eastern Asia, South-eastern Asia, Southern Asia plus Iran
Europe, Africa, Western Asia excluding Iran
_3 defines EMEA narrowly (exc Central Asia and Iran) and APAC widely
Oceania, Central Asia, Eastern Asia, South-eastern Asia, Southern Asia plus Iran
